org.apache.flink.core.fs.local

类 LocalDataInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • org.apache.flink.core.fs.FSDataInputStream
        • org.apache.flink.core.fs.local.LocalDataInputStream
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    @Internal
public class LocalDataInputStream
extends FSDataInputStream
    The LocalDataInputStream class is a wrapper class for a data input stream to the local file system.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private java.nio.channels.FileChannel fileChannel 
      private java.io.FileInputStream fis
      The file input stream used to read data from.

      • LocalDataInputStream

        public LocalDataInputStream(java.io.File file)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Constructs a new LocalDataInputStream object from a given File object.
        参数:
        file - The File the data stream is read from
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if the data input stream cannot be created.

    • 方法详细资料

      • seek

        public void seek(long desired)
          throws java.io.IOException
        从类复制的说明: FSDataInputStream
        Seek to the given offset from the start of the file. The next read() will be from that location. Can't seek past the end of the file.
        指定者:
        seek 在类中 FSDataInputStream
        参数:
        desired - the desired offset
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if an error occurred while seeking inside the input stream.

      • getPos

        public long getPos()
            throws java.io.IOException
        从类复制的说明: FSDataInputStream
        Gets the current position in the input stream.
        指定者:
        getPos 在类中 FSDataInputStream
        返回:
        current position in the input stream
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if an I/O error occurred in the underlying stream implementation while accessing the stream's position.
